entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
